rules_text:
Enchant opponent
Whenever Curse of the Blacksea enters the battlefield or you cast a spell that targets enchanted player, they lose 3 life unless they sacrifice a nonland permanent or discard a card.
notes:
UB:
 - even MV only
 - Zombies
BR:
 - Five curses
 - Curses
WB:
 - triggered abilities
 - flicker
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
